articles.title: Deepika Padukone says Ranveer Singh keeps on asking why she manages home herself, even orders groceries - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Deepika Padukone said that because of the upbringing she got, she believes in taking care of her home herself, instead of outsourcing duties to her staff.
articles.content: Deepika Padukone may have a bevy of personal staff at her disposal but she likes to manage her home and office herself. She talked about the grounding and rootedness she saw in her family while growi… [+2837 chars]

articles.title: BB 14: Rakhi Sawant says she hasn’t had a man in her life since ex Abhishek, wants Abhinav Shukla to be her sperm donor - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rakhi Sawant said that she misses having a man in her life after her break-up with ex-boyfriend Abhishek Awasthi. She added that she has frozen her eggs and wants Abhinav Shukla to be the sperm donor.
articles.content: During Mondays episode of Bigg Boss 14, Rakhi Sawant had a heart-to-heart conversation with Sonali Phogat about her husband Ritesh and her liking for Abhinav Shukla. Rakhi said that she is ready to a… [+1887 chars]
